question: Which of the following statements is incorrect about President of India?
option1: The President has the power to declare an area as scheduled area
option2: He appoints the comptroller and auditor general of India and determines his remuneration
option3: He can seek any information related to Union Legislation and administration from Prime Minister
option4: He can establish an interstate council if at any time it appears to him that it is in public interest
answer: He appoints the comptroller and auditor general of India and determines his remuneration
explanation: Second statement is incorrect because President appoints Comptroller and auditor General of India but does not determine his remuneration.
